name: Amazing Paulsonothon
description:
Paulsonothon the Axe Thrower is a barrel hater's favorite game. Do you find the pesky wooden barrels disgusting and disturbing? Paulsonothon comes to your rescue in dispatching of those troublesome barrels!

  • Three thematically different levels
    • easy - Outskirts
    • medium - Fields
    • hard - Carnival
  • More axes than you've ever seen!
  • 36 Unlockable clothing accessories
    • Including a bloody fur hat (not literally bloody!)
  • Awesome theme music by @Synival
  • The manliest man hero.

Like. Literally. Do you hate barrels? Here's to freaking barrels!
